dict.acceptation: 抱怨，诉苦；申诉，控诉，抗议；
诉说，申诉，控告[后面常跟从句]；

sent.orig: Agitation: Of the above grievances we not hesitate to complain, and to complain loudly and insistently.
sent.trans: 鼓动工作：对于上述不平之事，我们毫不犹豫地进行控诉，不断大声地疾呼。

sent.orig: The more complain, the more reason you have to complain.
sent.trans: 越怨天尤人，就越有理由抱怨。

sent.orig: If professors complain of low incomes, we conclude that they desire higher salaries.
sent.trans: 如果教授们抱怨收入低，我们可以推定其想获得更高的薪水。

sent.orig: You complain that morale is low.
sent.trans: 你抱怨说，员工士气低落。

sent.orig: Many people complain that the fee-paying system keeps poverty-stricken students away from college.
sent.trans: 许多人抱怨新收费体系会让贫困学生上不起大学。
